00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/cxx/l4types.h>
00029 #include <l4/cxx/basic_ostream>
00030 #include <l4/sys/err.h>
00031 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00032 
00033 
00039 
00040 #ifndef L4_CXX_NO_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE
00041 # define L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE 20
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #if defined(L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE)
00045 #include <l4/util/backtrace.h>
00046 #endif
00047 
00049 namespace L4
00050 {
00051 
00064   class Exception_tracer
00065   {
00066 #if defined(L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE)
00067   private:
00068     void *_pc_array[L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE];
00069     int   _frame_cnt;
00070 
00071   protected:
00075 #if defined(__PIC__)
00076     Exception_tracer() throw() : _frame_cnt(0) {}
00077 #else
00078     Exception_tracer() throw() : _frame_cnt(l4util_backtrace(_pc_array, L4_CXX_EXCEPTION_BACKTRACE)) {}
00079 #endif
00080 
00081   public:
00085     void const *const *pc_array() const throw() { return _pc_array; }
00089     int frame_count() const throw() { return _frame_cnt; }
00090 #else
00091   protected:
00095     Exception_tracer() throw() {}
00096 
00097   public:
00101     void const *const *pc_array() const throw() { return 0; }
00105     int frame_count() const throw() { return 0; }
00106 #endif
00107   };
00108 
00117   class Base_exception : public Exception_tracer
00118   {
00119   protected:
00121     Base_exception() throw() {}
00122 
00123   public:
00127     virtual char const *str() const throw () = 0;
00128 
00130     virtual ~Base_exception() throw () {}
00131   };
00132 
00140   class Runtime_error : public Base_exception
00141   {
00142   private:
00143     long _errno;
00144     char _extra[80];
00145 
00146   public:
00147     explicit Runtime_error(long err_no, char const *extra = 0) throw ()
00148       : _errno(err_no)
00149     {
00150       for (unsigned i = 0; i < sizeof(_extra) && extra[i]; ++i)
00151         _extra[i] = extra[i];
00152       _extra[sizeof(_extra) - 1] = 0;
00153     }
00154     char const *str() const throw ()
00155     { return l4sys_errtostr(_errno); }
00156     char const *extra_str() const { return _extra; }
00157     ~Runtime_error() throw () {}
00158 
00159     long err_no() const throw() { return _errno; }
00160   };
00161 
00166   class Out_of_memory : public Runtime_error
00167   {
00168   public:
00170     explicit Out_of_memory(char const *extra = "") throw()
00171     : Runtime_error(-L4_ENOMEM, extra) {}
00173     ~Out_of_memory() throw() {}
00174   };
00175 
00176 
00181   class Element_already_exists : public Runtime_error
00182   {
00183   public:
00184     explicit Element_already_exists(char const *e = "") throw()
00185     : Runtime_error(-L4_EEXIST, e) {}
00186     ~Element_already_exists() throw() {}
00187   };
00188 
00197   class Unknown_error : public Base_exception
00198   {
00199   public:
00200     Unknown_error() throw() {}
00201     char const *str() const throw() { return "unknown error"; }
00202     ~Unknown_error() throw() {}
00203   };
00204 
00205   
00210   class Element_not_found : public Runtime_error
00211   {
00212   public:
00213     explicit Element_not_found(char const *e = "") throw()
00214     : Runtime_error(-L4_ENOENT, e) {}
00215   };
00216 
00224   class Invalid_capability : public Base_exception
00225   {
00226   private:
00227     Cap<void> const _o;
00228 
00229   public:
00234     explicit Invalid_capability(Cap<void> const &o) throw() : _o(o) {}
00235     template< typename T>
00236     explicit Invalid_capability(Cap<T> const &o) throw() : _o(o.cap()) {}
00237     char const *str() const throw() { return "invalid object"; }
00238 
00243     Cap<void> const &cap() const throw() { return _o; }
00244     ~Invalid_capability() throw() {}
00245   };
00246 
00253   class Com_error : public Runtime_error
00254   {
00255   public:
00260     explicit Com_error(long err) throw() : Runtime_error(err) {}
00261 
00262     ~Com_error() throw() {}
00263   };
00264 
00268   class Bounds_error : public Runtime_error
00269   {
00270   public:
00271     explicit Bounds_error(char const *e = "") throw()
00272     : Runtime_error(-L4_ERANGE, e) {}
00273     ~Bounds_error() throw() {}
00274   };
00276 };
00277 
00278 inline
00279 L4::BasicOStream &
00280 operator << (L4::BasicOStream &o, L4::Base_exception const &e)
00281 {
00282   o << "Exception: " << e.str() << ", backtrace ...\n";
00283   for (int i = 0; i < e.frame_count(); ++i)
00284     o << L4::n_hex(l4_addr_t(e.pc_array()[i])) << '\n';
00285 
00286   return o;
00287 }
00288 
00289 inline
00290 L4::BasicOStream &
00291 operator << (L4::BasicOStream &o, L4::Runtime_error const &e)
00292 {
00293   o << "Exception: " << e.str() << ": ";
00294   if (e.extra_str())
00295     o << e.extra_str() << ": ";
00296   o << "backtrace ...\n";
00297   for (int i = 0; i < e.frame_count(); ++i)
00298     o << L4::n_hex(l4_addr_t(e.pc_array()[i])) << '\n';
00299 
00300   return o;
00301 }
